video_title: Men NEED to understand about WOMEN's loyalty
transcript:
how is loyalty different between men and
women well one is about as loyal as
another though to different things the
thing to understand about women's
loyalty that men often fail to
appreciate is that women are loyal to
their feelings for instance if a woman
is completely in love with a guy if she
is 11 out of 10 attracted to him then
her loyalty is impressive indeed and she
will remain loyal as long as those
feelings remain in her heart a woman who
is extremely attracted to man will move
across the world for him will change her
religion for him we'll break with her
family for him will'll lie cheat and
steal for him and will help bury the
body with him if necessary a woman at
that level of attraction is ride or die
and she will do absolutely crazy
irrational and life-altering things for
a man to keep him in her life it's both
impressive and terrifying how loyal a
woman can be under the right conditions
